name: nuxt-lottie
description: Easily integrate Lottie animations into your Nuxt project

scripts.dev:prepare: nuxt-module-build build --stub && nuxt-module-build prepare && nuxi prepare playground
scripts.release: npm run lint && npm run prepack && changelogen --release
scripts.release:online: npm run lint && npm run prepack && changelogen --release && npm publish && git push --follow-tags
scripts.flush: rm -rf .nuxt && rm -rf dist && npx nuxi cleanup && nuxt build && yarn dev:prepare
scripts.flush:all: rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf playground/node_modules && yarn install && yarn flush && yarn dev
